title: Pet Friendly, Spa with Sun Deck, Ceiling Fans, Great Neighborhood
posting_body: ['Village of Santo Domingo', '8530 W Sahara Ave, Las Vegas, NV, 89117', 'Use this link for more information:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 39', 'OR Text', '39', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to chat!', 'VILLAGE OF SANTO DOMINGO APARTMENTS FOR RENT IN LAS VEGAS, NV', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 748 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Come home to Village of Santo Domingo Apartments in Las Vegas, NV!', 'Our apartments are home to a fantastic location where endless opportunities for work and play collide.', 'At our apartments, you can choose from our apartments that are complete with everything you need to always feel right at home.', 'Here you’ll find yourself surrounded by an amenity-rich community and beautiful scenery.', 'Our apartments place you in the best destination to embrace Las Vegas living.', 'This prime neighborhood will give you easier commutes and allow you to experience the perfect balance of modern city life and relaxation.', 'Ready to step into your dream apartment?', 'Apply now to Village of Santo Domingo in Las Vegas today.', 'Features', '- Separate Dining Room', '- Spacious 1 & 2 Bedroom Apartment Homes', '- Large Private Patio/Balcony', '- Kitchen Pantry', '- Garden Bath Tubs', '- Full Sized Washer & Dryer', '- Fireplaces', '- Ceiling Fans', '- Central Heating and A/C', '- Roommate Style Floor Plans', '- Built in Shelves', 'Community Amenities', '- Close to Public Transportation', '- Professionally Managed by AMC', '- Swimming Pool', '- Gated Access', '- Great Neighborhood', '- Pet Friendly', '- Courtyards', '- Covered Parking', '- Conveniently Located Close to Local Dining, Shopping, & Entertainment', '- RESERVE YOUR NEW APARTMENT NOW - ASK US', 'A QUESTION', '- Spa with Sun Deck', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday: 8:30AM-5:30PM', 'Saturday: 10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet Rent- 40.00', 'Non-Refundable Fee- 400.00', 'Pet friendly, call for details', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'mMbMg0G3v']
